snippet: Benjamin J. Rhodes is a 35-year-old deputy national security adviser with a soft voice, strong opinions and a reputation as the man who channels President Obama on foreign policy.
abstract: Benjamin J Rhodes is deputy national security adviser who has developed reputation for having significant influence on tone of Pres Obama's foreign policy; Rhodes is drafting Pres Obama's address to Israeli people that will be given during his first state visit.
lead_paragraph: Benjamin J. Rhodes is a 35-year-old deputy national security adviser with a soft voice, strong opinions and a reputation as the man who channels President Obama on foreign policy.

headline.seo: Benjamin Rhodes, Obama’s Voice, Helps Shape Policy
headline.main: Worldly at 35, and Shaping Obama’s Voice
headline.print_headline: Worldly at 35, And Shaping Obama’s Voice
